title: Error in getting last block.
body:
Hi there,

please note that this is an issue tracker reserved for bug reports and feature requests.

For general questions please use the gitter channel or the Ethereum stack exchange at https://ethereum.stackexchange.com.

#### System information

Geth version: not known (can't find out)
OS & Version: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS
Commit hash : 

#### Expected behaviour
return Last block

#### Actual behaviour
it only returns 7280008

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Hello, I tried to get last block.
So I developed this function and It worked well.
```python
def return_end(ip):
    hd = {"Content-Type": "application/json"}

    res = json.loads(
        requests.post(url='http://' + ip,
                      data='{"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "eth_blockNumber", "params": [], "id": 1}',
                      headers=hd).content)

    now = int(res['result'], 16)

    return now
```

There haven't been a problem for 2 months

but it suddenly stuck in 7280008.. It only returns 7280008

error message is below.
```
##############################                                                                                                                                                        │················································
                                                                                                                                                                                      │················································
WARN [03-04|05:59:22.888] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=162c432206692cc2 err="retrieved hash chain is invalid"                                                        │················································
INFO [03-04|06:22:46.585] Regenerated local transaction journal    transactions=0 accounts=0                                                                                          │················································
INFO [03-04|07:22:46.585] Regenerated local transaction journal    transactions=0 accounts=0                                                                                          │················································
ERROR[03-04|07:56:21.600]                                                                                                                                                             │················································
########## BAD BLOCK #########                                                                                                                                                        │················································
Chain config: {ChainID: 1 Homestead: 1150000 DAO: 1920000 DAOSupport: true EIP150: 2463000 EIP155: 2675000 EIP158: 2675000 Byzantium: 4370000 Constantinople: <nil> Engine: ethash}   │················································
                                                                                                                                                                                      │················································
Number: 7280000                                                                                                                                                                       │················································
Hash: 0xeddb0590e1095fbe51205a51a297daef7259e229af0432214ae6cb2c1f750750                                                                                                              │················································
                                                                                                                                                                                      │················································
                                                                                                                                                                                      │················································
Error: invalid difficulty: have 2957101900364072, want 2958201410943272 
```

Now, last block is over 730000.. but it didn't work.

how can I solve this problem?

thanks.


#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]
````

Please update your Geth instance. You are running an old code, which does not contain the Constantinople fork. The network was upgraded last week, so only new software which has the changes in it can sync after the update point (block 7280000).

> Please update your Geth instance. You are running an old code, which does not contain the Constantinople fork. The network was upgraded last week, so only new software which has the changes in it can sync after the update point (block 7280000).

Thanks guys! It's work
